scene_description: Hero character at edge of cliff overlooking vast fantasy landscape

structured_prompt.short_description: The hero character stands at the edge of a cliff, overlooking a vast fantasy landscape, lost in contemplation and introspection

objects.description: Hero character, wearing worn and practical travel attire, with a few telling scars or marks, standing with feet shoulder-width apart, toes curled over the edge of the cliff, hands clasped behind their back, and gaze cast outward
objects.shape_and_color: Earthy tones, with a touch of blue in the sky to hint at possibilities ahead
objects.appearance_details: specific facial features, with a subtle emphasis on the character's emotional state
objects.pose: static, with a sense of relaxed tension
objects.orientation: facing camera, with a slight angle to convey unease and uncertainty

structured_prompt.background_setting: Vast fantasy landscape, with a cliff's edge visible at the character's feet, and a horizon stretching out to the distance, featuring rolling hills, mountains, and a touch of blue in the sky

lighting.conditions: Rembrandt, with a warm color temperature and a soft light texture
lighting.direction: 45-degree angle to the character's face, with the light source coming from the right side of the frame
lighting.shadow: Subtle, with a triangle of light on the shadow side of the character's cheek, adding depth and dimension to their face

aesthetics.composition: Rule of thirds, with the character's face and eyes at the intersection of the top-left or top-right thirds
aesthetics.color_scheme: Muted, earthy tones, with a touch of blue in the sky to hint at possibilities ahead
aesthetics.mood_atmosphere: Serene melancholy, with a sense of contemplation and introspection

photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: f/2.8, with a shallow depth of field to draw attention to the character's face and eyes
photographic_characteristics.focus: Sharp on subject, with a subtle blur to the landscape behind
photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: 45-degree angle to the character, with a slight Dutch angle to convey unease and uncertainty

simple_prompt: The hero character stands at the edge of a cliff, overlooking a vast fantasy landscape, lost in contemplation and introspection. Camera: 45-degree angle to the character, with a slight Dutch angle to convey unease and uncertainty. Lens: 50mm. Lighting: Rembrandt, with a warm color temperature and a soft light texture
